name: Mr.Trust
greetingText: Btw I really like this new name Jantuu!
wishText: May the js.prototypes always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to U JAN!!  BAR BAR DIN YE AYE blah blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text3: But then I stopped i thought why not write some code after all ur girl is a programmer
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it or nott.
replayText: and i miss you jantuu see you soon.
